description:
First
While the TV is showing a couple of athletes on the podium, Dad tells Bunji "Whatever you aim for, you have to be first! There`s a big difference between first and second!" The next day, Bunji heads off to school to be first and does other things.
Snow Woman
In the next fun meeting, there`s a class play, and Fumi gets to play the role of Snow Woman. She`s all excited over it, but when she watches Snow Woman in a scary TV program, she completely loses interest in doing it.
Considerate
Recently, even though Grandma is doing her usual things and doesn`t get bothered, there are plenty of times where others go out of their way to be considerate. Today, on the bus, and at the park as well ...
Concentrate
Being tied down to a tight schedule, Mom has to concentrate on her job. If she stays at home, it`s too noisy for her, so that`s why she tries to escape to a family restaurant or a coffee shop, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: イチバン / ゆきおんな / きづかい / 集中
